summary: Turkish director Hasan Karacadag is something of an unusual case. In a nation that appears uncertain how to feel about its own history with exploitation film and generally reluctant to ... See full summary »
cast: Elcin Atamgüc|Nihan Aypolat|Pervin Bagdat|Su Burcu Coskun|Elif Erdal|Koray Kadiraga|Mete Sahinoglu|Ceren Sertac|Ismail Yildiz|Nalan Örgüt
title: Dabbe: Bir Cin Vakasi
